term.title: pyrolysis-gas chromatography

item.text: A version of reaction chromatography in which a sample is thermally decomposed to simpler fragments before entering the column.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 827 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
